titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to limit the number of years Representatives and Senators may serve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary:
12/18/2007--Introduced.
Constitutional Amendment -- Amends the Constitution of the United States to limit to 18 the number of years U.S. Representatives and Senators may serve, excluding service to fill a vacancy.
